H0.text: The marathon is named after a city in what country. Greece

A4.text: The name Marathon comes from the legend of Pheidippides, the Greek messenger.

A5.text: The Athens Classic Marathon traces the route of the 1896 Olympic course, starting in Marathon on the eastern coast of Attica, site of the Battle of Marathon of 490 BC
